name: Neon Ball On The Wall
description:
Neon Ball on the Wall is an amazing single touch game featuring beautiful and colorful neon graphics coupled with xtreme gameplay.

The game is about a ball rolling its wall on a wall through day and night trying not to fall. You have to help the ball keep going while collecting as many items you can collect and trying not to fall off the edge.

The gameplay is pretty simple as the neon ball will be rolling itself. you can tap the screen to turn the direction of the ball. The ball only moves diagonally making a zigzag movement.

The game features 2 different types of lighting, day and night. In the day you will be able to see the platforms on which the ball is rolling very clearly but in the night you will only be able to see a little bit of the path. The ball is made of neons so you will be able to see it clearly even in the night along with the special items.

Try to go as further as you can without falling the edge and enjoy.
